content: Welcome to your new project! I can help you edit it however you want. What would you like to do?
I want you to put an image of an apple in the backgroun
I can't add or edit the background directly, but I can place an image within a specific component. Would you like me to add the apple image to the Hero, Header, or Footer component?
I want you to put an image of an apple in the backgroun

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Hero1732099912","image_gen_prompt":"an apple","placement_instructions":"set as the background image","acknowledgement_message":"Adding an image of an apple to the background of the Hero component..."}
function.name: GenerateImageAndPlaceInComponent

content: Adding an image of an apple to the background of the Hero component...
The image of an apple has been added to the background of the Hero component. What would you like to do next?
add a pear skeatch and blurry as background

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Hero1732099912","image_gen_prompt":"a sketch of a pear, blurry","placement_instructions":"set as the background image","acknowledgement_message":"Adding a sketch of a pear as a blurry background to the Hero component..."}
function.name: GenerateImageAndPlaceInComponent

content: Adding a sketch of a pear as a blurry background to the Hero component...
I have added a blurry sketch of a pear to the background of the Hero component. Anything else you need?
yes, I want you to add a forms to select your prefered type of fruit

To add a form to select the preferred type of fruit, go to the "Components" tab in the MakeInfinite studio and drag and drop a Form component into your canvas. Once the form component is added, I can help you modify it if needed.
better, add an image of an small apple on the left of the component

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Hero1732099912","image_gen_prompt":"a small apple","placement_instructions":"place on the left side of the Hero component","acknowledgement_message":"Adding a small apple image to the left side of the Hero component..."}
function.name: GenerateImageAndPlaceInComponent

content: Adding a small apple image to the left side of the Hero component...
